content:
wasmtime-publish opened PR #11471 from bytecodealliance:ci/release-36.0.0 to bytecodealliance:release-36.0.0:

This is an [automated pull request][process] from CI which is intended to notify maintainers that it's time to release Wasmtime 36.0.0. The [release branch][branch] was created roughly two weeks ago and it's now time for it to be published and released.

It's recommended that maintainers double-check that [RELEASES.md] is up-to-date and that there are no known issues before merging this PR. When this PR is merged a release tag will automatically created, crates will be published, and CI artifacts will be produced.

[RELEASES.md]: https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/blob/release-36.0.0/RELEASES.md
[process]: https://docs.wasmtime.dev/contributing-release-process.html
[branch]: https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/tree/release-36.0.0

bjorn3 commented on PR #11471:

Release build on CI failed: https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/actions/runs/17101679508/job/48499707496 I suspect due to a truncated download of ninja-linux.zip.
